indexes.name: accounts_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX accounts_pkey ON public.accounts USING btree (id)

indexes.name: emails_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX emails_pkey ON public.emails USING btree (id)

indexes.name: emails_account_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX emails_account_id_idx ON public.emails USING btree (account_id)

indexes.name: emails_account_id_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX emails_account_id_key ON public.emails USING btree (account_id)

indexes.name: emails_value_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX emails_value_idx ON public.emails USING btree (value)

indexes.name: emails_value_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX emails_value_key ON public.emails USING btree (value)

indexes.name: emails_value_not_deleted_idx
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX emails_value_not_deleted_idx ON public.emails USING btree (value) WHERE (NOT deleted)

constraints.name: emails_account_id_fkey
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT

indexes.name: passwords_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX passwords_pkey ON public.passwords USING btree (id)

indexes.name: passwords_account_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX passwords_account_id_idx ON public.passwords USING btree (account_id)

indexes.name: passwords_account_id_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX passwords_account_id_key ON public.passwords USING btree (account_id)

indexes.name: passwords_value_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX passwords_value_idx ON public.passwords USING btree (value)

constraints.name: passwords_account_id_fkey
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT

indexes.name: profiles_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_pkey ON public.profiles USING btree (id)

indexes.name: profiles_account_id_idx
indexes.def: CREATE INDEX profiles_account_id_idx ON public.profiles USING btree (account_id)

indexes.name: profiles_account_id_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX profiles_account_id_key ON public.profiles USING btree (account_id)

constraints.name: profiles_account_id_fkey
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT

relations.def: FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES accounts(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT

driver.name: postgres
driver.database_version: PostgreSQL 15.4 on aarch64-unknown-linux-musl, compiled by gcc (Alpine 12.2.1_git20220924-r10) 12.2.1 20220924, 64-bit
